inclusion.criterion: Stenosis of 70% or more by carotid artery duplex, CTA or MRA.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No evidence of TIA or CVA originating in area of the brain supplied by the carotid artery under study, in the four months preceding treatment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eligibility for both treatment options: suited for operative treatment as assessed by an anesthesiologist
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eligibility for both treatment options: suited for endovascular procedure by established radiological guidelines
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery. He is physically active and has no other cardiovascular risk factors.
